answers.answer: Hi and thanks for using the forum.How have your blood sugars been?  Are they controlled?  Many diabetics have issues with neuropathy- which is nerve pain.  This may be what you are experiencing.  You need to discuss this with your doctor.  There are medications that can help with this pain, but you need to see your doctor to find out if this is indeed what you are experiencing.  In the meantime, work on your blood sugar control.  Good luck.Bridget

question: hello to be honest ive abused my diabetes with all sweet things most days. i used to get a pain in my feet that made me jerk my legs once a week but now its daily the pain seems to make me jerk my leg have you any ideas thanks tim
title: shooting pains up the leg from my feet
